name: Shooting Hoops VR (a basketball VR sports game)
name_original: Shooting Hoops VR (a basketball VR sports game)
description:
Shooting Hoops VR 3D (a basketball VR sports game) makes you feel the real basketball playing experience on your smartphones with VR.

View the ground in a 360 environment and feel the thrill of shooting the balls into the baskets. Best VR game for killing time in 2016. Be the laziest boss in the office, student in the classroom, passengers in the bus or train and so on.

This game only works with virtual reality glasses like Google Cardboard or gear vr or any same type of glasses. To play this basketball shooting move your VR headset to look up, down or round and try to throw ball in hoop. It’s time to check your basketball skills. Score as much as you can and see yourself top in the leaderboards.

Don’t forget to share the score with your friends.Have fun with the best VR experience.
